TopicTitle: Achievements! Do random stuff and get awards!

Articles.Content:
My idea for the game is to get achievements (Edit: No steam achievements, Squad denied they will add those) That will track the stuff you've done. (achievements for Career give you cash, too! )

Examples (Currently for both Sandbox and Career, I'll add Career ones):

Pale Blue Dot

Get a Unmanned Craft to escape Eeloo's Orbit.

---------------------

How about we Buzz the tower?

Crash into the Control Tower of the SPH.

---------------------

We are not buzzing the tower.

Have a near miss with the SPH Control Tower.

---------------------

One small step for Kerbal

Land on the Mun

---------------------

Encore!

Land on the Mun twice.

---------------------

WAT

Land on Jool

---------------------

HAX

Hack Gravity or Enable infinite fuel/RCS/EVA Fuel

---------------------

July 20th, 1969

Land on the Mun at 0.7027 : 22.7470

---------------------

Mods would also be able to add achievments.

Examples:

Full Communication

Set up a strong communication network that covers all the planets and moons in the Kerbol System. (RemoteTech2)

---------------------

Nuking like a Boss

Destroy a vessel that is over 9000 parts completely with Laser-Guided Missles (Romfarer's Lazor-Guided Weapons)

---------------------

KSC, We have a problem.

Destroy an apollo capsule in Munar orbit. (FASA)

---------------------

Gravioli

Destroy a space shuttle with a small asteroid or debris part. (KSO)

---------------------

Thats all for now, I'll add more examples later.

Edited April 7, 2014 by ExplodingRocketShips

I would recommend doing a bit of research on this... The Devs have already stated (by means of the "Not Happening" list in the Planned Features section of the wiki) that achievements will not be added.
Actually wiki only speaks about steam achievements.

Regardless of whether or not it will be stock there is a mod for it if you want it that badly.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52535-0-23-5-Achievements-1-6-0-Earn-136-achievements-while-playing
